snippet: When Iraq’s security forces crumbled in the face of militants, they were labeled cowards. But in the case of one brigade, at least, what emerges instead is a portrait of mismanagement and treachery.
abstract: Account emerging about the disintegration of the Ninth Brigade of Iraq's security forces is one of mismanagement, incompetence and ultimate treachery; Iraqi forces simply crumbled in the face of attacks by militants from Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, but Ninth Brigade appears to have been so undercut by cronyism and corruption, that it was able to fight for less than two weeks before descending into a venomous internal dispute.
lead_paragraph: When Iraq’s security forces crumbled in the face of militants, they were labeled cowards. But in the case of one brigade, at least, what emerges instead is a portrait of mismanagement and treachery.

headline.main: After Retreat, Iraqi Soldiers Fault Officers
headline.print_headline: After Retreat, Iraqi Soldiers Fault Officers

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
